title: Chapter 1 - Eureka!
excerpt: Eureka, our scientist has got this revolutionary idea to change how we precieve softwares and he is planning to change the world!
wiki: First comic in series START-UP, Einstein is a genius and he quit his job to start his own bussiness. He is planning to lay down foundation of the best technology for the world. He has no idea  what more challenges are on his pathway.
